nodes.text: The death trooper training camp was a training camp maintained for the recruitment of death troopers by the Galactic Empire on Scarif prior to the Battle of Scarif. In a request meant to be sent out through the oversector, preferably to a sector admiral, General Sotorus Ramda requested two platoons of death troopers to be returned as the training camp needed more instructors. Ramda preferred veteran death troopers with body augmentations at v1.01 or earlier.
